topic.title: Biden Calls Media BLACKOUT Until Thursday - The Democrats are WORRIED!
topic.body:

However, this claim was promptly exposed by the Director of National Intelligence as a blatant lie by the Democrats to try to sway public opinion back in their favor!

1598581805_1BfrmacRWaPSuHVmRdvaMUYykqd2M.body:
conspiracy theories are hard to kill.
ideas are bulletproof.
you cannot kill an idea.

once a conspiracy theory like this begins to propagate whether intentionally or non-intentionally, the person who created the theory then is immortalized in a sense. Its sort of like how ZeroNet works based on distributed servers all serving the same content making it so that it is damn near impossible for a government take-down to be effective if traditional means are used. In the sense of a conspiracy theory, extremist beliefs and opinions can then become attached to the core components of the theory which will lead to potential political gain for the original author.

For example's sake: https://www.isdglobal.org/isd-publications/investigating-natural-news/

There are many logical deductions, but nothing beyond a reasonable doubt. So, at this time, no matter what people claim there is no way to be 100% certain of who is controlling the character Q. For more information, contact via ZeroMail. Thank you!
